entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CancellationTokenSource disposed in AbstractExtensionMethodImportCompletionProvider.cs #58932
  • Switch Solution-Explorer search to be async-streaming (like NavTo). #58931
  • Some nullable parameters are null-checked #58929
  • False 'collection initializer will implicitly dereference the possibly null member' warning is reproted for collection initializers with extension methods #58925
  • Code Cleanup: Settings revert out of the set and cannot be used #58924
  • Valid keywords missing from completion list between parentheses #58921
  • Consider moving AutoFormattingOptions to C# #58917
  • Analyzer driver fails to account for source generator outputs in ServiceHub #58916
  • CS8795 Showing When it Shouldn't #58913
  • IDE0063 could produce invalid code #58911
  • Intellisense missing ref/int when trying to write lambda #58906

Closed

  • WorkspaceConfigurationOptions are read from global options, which are not available OOP #58874
    17.2
  • IDE0040 warns to add accessibility modifiers to explicitly-implemented static interface methods #58914
  • Param nullchecking emit crash with async method #58796
    17.2
  • Wrong, Unclear and not helpful WorkspaceDiagnostic errors reported for .csproj projects based on versions below .NET 5.0 #58592
    17.2
  • Questionable DFA behavior #58922
  • Possible bug for `ParameterSyntax.Update` API around `exclamationExclamationToken` behavior #58597
    17.2
  • Param-nullchecking crash in EmbeddedTypesManager #58824
  • Quick info needs to show signatures of anonymous delegates. #58871
  • Suggestion to simplify lambda and delegate syntax #40364
    Backlog
  • IDE0045 introduce unnecessary casts #58898

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle null coalescing assign-to-self scenarios #58933
    Area-IDE
  • Revert 58892 #58930
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1559547 #58926
    auto-merge
  • Revert "Add VSTypeScriptFormattingService to external access (#58817)" #58923
    Area-IDE
  • Don't remove cast when converting method group to object #58920
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [EE] Handle ArrayExpansion for 1D array with non-zero lower bounds #58915
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • draft #58910
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #58928
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Syntax tree configuration #58889
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix 'add accessibility' false positive with abstract statics in interfaces #58918
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Mark APIs as shipped #58776
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1557542 #58905
    auto-merge
  • Fix emit of param-nullchecking on async methods #58822
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Clone source from mirror for DartLab integration tests #58872
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #58919
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Fix ParameterSyntax.Update to account for '!!' #58912
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix param-nullchecking crash related to EmbeddedTypesManager #58825
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Formatting options refactoring - step 2 #58891
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Show a specialized display for anonymous delegates in C# #58908
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Restore feature to tell people when a lambda is unnecessary. #58875
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #58907
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Introduce helper extensions to make it easier to check LangVersions. #58896
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix 'remove unnecessary paren' case where we weren't removing around a suppressed expression #58903
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix case where we were not removing a removable cast. #58901
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58894
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #58934
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix foreach deconstruction nullability #52722
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • Allow xml docs to still be created when 'emit metadata only' is on. #57667
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce the memory usage of InheritanceMarginTarget #58175
    Area-IDE
  • Improve `CSharpSyntaxFacts.IsValidIdentifier` performance #55510
    Area-IDE, Community, Area-Performance
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable CA2009: Do not call ToImmutableCollection on an ImmutableCollection value #53141
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add prefer trailing commas code-style option #54859
    Area-IDE
  • [draft] IDE response to raw string literals #58846
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify SolutionEventMonitor #58868
    Area-IDE
  • Move reading HideAdvancedMembers option up #58747
    Area-IDE
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Rename Basic to Visual Basic in Visual Studio options page #53134
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove places where the compiler is swallowing exceptions #58870
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Ide analyzer options #58765
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Formatting options refactoring - step 3 #58904
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Revert "Merge pull request #57132 from CyrusNajmabadi/branchId3" #58856
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions #58730
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Verify correct additional location for reported diagnostic #58630
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Fix ParseVBErrorOrWarning #47833
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable CA1822 in Visual Studio layer #50569
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Community, Needs UX Triage
